original_text: Moreover, Manasseh also shed so much innocent blood that he filled Jerusalem from end to end—besides the sin that he had caused Judah to commit, so that they did evil in the eyes of the Lord.
korean_text: 므낫세가 유다에게 범죄하게 하여 여호와께서 보시기에 악을 행한 것 외에도 또 무죄한 자의 피를 심히 많이 흘려 예루살렘 이 끝에서 저 끝까지 가득하게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Manasseh also shed so much innocent blood
sentences.korean_translation: 므낫세는 또한 너무 많은 무죄한 피를 흘렸는데

sentences.original_text: that he filled Jerusalem from end to end
that he had caused Judah to commit
in the eyes of the Lord.
